ExampleDefinition.Description:
Demonstrates how to Add, Change or Remove RenderableSeries with the new [url='http://www.scichart.com/documentation/v5.x/webframe.html#SciChart.Charting~SciChart.Charting.Common.MarkupExtensions.SeriesBinding.html']SeriesBinding Markup Extension[/url], which forms part of the MVVM API in SciChart.
This example also shows how use styles for RenderableSeries and change series type at runtime from your ViewModel.
[b][i]Tip![/i][/b]
- Select series type in ComboBox and add new series by pressing "+" button.
- You can also use ShiftValue slider to customize DataSeries generation.
- Select RenderableSeries via SeriesSelectionModifier and remove series by pressing "-" button
- Select RenderableSeries via SeriesSelectionModifier and change it type by changing type in ComboBox
